Method Detail

resetPlayingField

public void resetPlayingField()
The resetPlayingField method is called when a MouseHero and a Mouse collide. The method repositions all the Avatars are there original positions.

restartGame

public void restartGame()
Description copied from class: Board
This function is invoked when the user selects to restart game. It should reset all the game variables.

Specified by:
restartGame in class Board
